channel.title: Treks. Game Studio
channel.description: Recent content on Treks. Game Studio

item.title: Monster Trader
item.description:
Most monsters make a living by terrorizing villages and eating adventurers. You prefer to buy low, sell high, and make a nice profit. Don’t kill that wandering adventurer, sell him an overpriced sword and send him on his way!

Made in 48 hours for Ludem Dare 33.

Ludem Dare page

Download

item.title: About
item.description:
I make games in my spare time. I have special interest in procedural generation, rpgs, building, crafting, simulation, sandbox, and multiplayer games.

I mainly design and program, and dabble in art.
